Literature.Title: How Insertion of a Single Tryptophan in the N-Terminus of a Cecropin A-Melittin Hybrid Peptide Changes Its Antimicrobial and Biophysical Profile.
Literature.Author: Ferreira AR, Teixeira C, Sousa CF, Bessa LJ, Gomes P, Gameiro P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=1.2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2.4-4.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=2.4-4.8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2.4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=2.4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4.8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=4.8µg/ml)
